title: Cyclist Magazine Podcast Episode 40 - The mad world of Jens Voigt
content:
Cyclist magazine
14 Oct 2021

On this week's Cyclist Magazine Podcast, we delve into the mind of Jens Voigt

The fall of the Berlin Wall, being part of the German army, being airlifted to hospital at the Tour de France, how cycling stopped him from being like a villain from Grand Theft Auto and how to form the perfect breakaway... just some of the amazing topics we cover in our Cyclist Magazine Podcast sit-down with the legendary Jens Voigt.

Inspiring, insightful, hilarious, this is one not to miss!

For more on the Specialized Crux mentioned at the top of the show, check out our story here.
